swagger: '2.0'
info:
  version: ''
  title: samsa
  description: Convert between OpenAPI v2 and v3 formats (YAML/JSON)
basePath: /convert
paths:
  /v3tov2:
    get:
      operationId: GET_v3tov2
      summary: OpenAPI 3.0 to Swagger
      parameters:
        - name: format
          in: query
          type: string
          enum:
            - json
            - yaml
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
        '400':
          description: ''
  /v2tov3:
    get:
      operationId: v2tov3
      summary: Swagger to OpenAPI 3.0
      parameters:
        - name: format
          in: query
          type: string
          enum:
            - json
            - yaml
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
        '400':
          description: ''
definitions: {}
